solution_line_template: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, Harry walks a total of {num_days_7dogs} * {dogs_per_7dog_day} = <<{num_days_7dogs}*{dogs_per_7dog_day}={dogs_7dog_days}>>{dogs_7dog_days} dogs.
Thus, in a week he walks {dogs_7dog_days} + {dogs_tuesday} + {dogs_thursday} = <<{dogs_7dog_days}+{dogs_tuesday}+{dogs_thursday}={total_dogs}>>{total_dogs} dogs.
At a rate of ${pay_per_dog} per dog, Harry ears ${pay_per_dog} * {total_dogs} = $<<{pay_per_dog}*{total_dogs}={total_pay}>>{total_pay} per week.
